description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Writing is parallel to spine. 19 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Contains tables. The text has been collated (see collation statements on fol. 148b, 173a, 268a, 361b). Dark cream glazed paper with laid lines visible. Leaves wanting between fol. 74 and 75. Fol. 320 and 321 are inverted.
author: Tiflīsī, Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm, -approximately 1203
contents: 3. fol. 2b-68a: Kitāb Tadqdimat al-ʻilāj / al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
4. fol. 69b-148b: Awdiyat al-adwiyah / al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
5. fol. 150b-173a: Rumūz al-minhāj wa-kunūz al-ʻilāj / Abū al-Ḥusayn [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
6. fol. 174b-180b: al-Risālah al-mutaʻārifah bi-asmāʼ [al-adwiyah] al-mutarādifah / Abū al-Ḥusayn [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
8. fol. 189b-259b: Lubāb al-asbāb / al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
9. fol. 261b-264b: Fī Sharḥ baʻḍ al-masāʼil li-asbāb wa-ʻalāmāt muntakhabah min al-Qānūn / Abū al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
10. fol. 264b-268a: [Treatise on compound drugs] / Abū al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
11. fol. 271b-354b: Kitāb Taḥṣīl al-ṣiḥḥah bi-al-asbāb al-sittah / Abū al-Ḥusayn al-Tiflīsī [Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tiflīsī].
extent: ii, 361, iii leaves: paper, ill. ; 155 x 110 (115 x 75) mm. bound to 165 x 118 mm.

title.@value: Taqdimat al-ʻilāj; Awdiyah al-adwiyah; Rumūz al-minhāj wa-kunūz al-ʻilāj ... [etc.].

provenance: Acquired from Brill, Leyden, 1900, from the books of Amīn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ḥulwānī al-Madanī al-Ḥanafī (Medina).
creator: Tiflīsī, Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm, -approximately 1203
تفليسي، حبيش بن ابراهيم
subject: Medicine, Arab—12th century
binding_note: Blue and brown marbled paper over paper pasteboards. Spine of brown leather with gold painted motifs.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
